import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' function Categories() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [categories, setCategories] = state.categoriesAPI.categories const [category, setCategory] = useState('') return(
setCategory(e.target.value)}/>

{category.name}
